analyzed: zhe sdang spyod pa ni sgrub dka' na mkhris pa'i nad la drod bag byin pa bzhin du phyir zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: But if one who is given to aversion takes up the difficult practice, like giving heat to one who is feverish, aversion increases.
